name: Ext_R3_IR_re_sIR
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.supportingPatientInformation for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.supportingPatientInformation from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ImmunizationRecommendation|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: Patient Information that supports the status and recommendation.  This includes patient observations, adverse reactions and allergy/intolerance information.
element.comment: `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.supportingPatientInformation` maps to R4 `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.supportingPatientInformation`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
